meanings.definition: Gerontologists: experts in the field of gerontology, the study of aging and older adults.
meanings.sent1: The gerontologists conducted research on the effects of aging on memory.
meanings.sent2: Many gerontologists work in nursing homes to help improve the lives of elderly residents.
meanings.sent3: The gerontologists organized a 'senior Olympics' event to study the impact of exercise on older adults.
meanings.sent4: She compared gerontologists to detectives, unraveling the mysteries of aging.
meanings.sent5: The gerontologists' dedication to understanding aging is truly inspiring.
